songs.title: Fulham Broadway
songs.lyrics:
I’m so tired today
Was meant to catch that train
From Fulham Broadway but I missed it
And I rang you up to check how you’ve done
And your eyes shine like gold from the sun to me
And I hear that you have messed it all up again
I’ll be right there to catch you
Like I’m gonna catch this train
And I’ll always be here you know
I will love your smile and love your way
As long as you can let it show
I can’t wait
I can’t wait
I can’t wait
I can’t wait
Am I lost or stuck
These females don’t give up
I guess my dumb luck
For getting shot down in the crossfire
All that I can say
Is I’ll walk away
It’s a game they play
If I’m shot down in the crossfire
I can’t wait
And she can’t drive yet
But she can drive me to a point of mental craze
And she will wind me up
She’s the sort of girl that keeps you hanging on and on for days
And I
I can’t wait
I can’t wait
I can’t wait
I can’t wait
Am I lost or stuck
These females don’t give up
I guess my dumb luck
For getting shot down in a crossfire
All that I can say
Is I’ll walk away
It’s a game they play
If I’m shot down in the crossfire
I can’t wait
Broken hearted
I’ve departed
To a place I feel more comfortable
And I belong here
Don’t shed no tear
Just remember I’ll be back again
I can’t wait
I can’t wait
I can’t wait
I can’t wait
Am I lost or stuck
These females don’t give up
I guess my dumb luck
For getting shot down in the crossfire
All that I can say
Is I’ll walk away
Its a game they play
If I’m shot down in the crossfire
I’m so tired today
Was meant to catch that train
From Fulham Broadway but I missed it
